var a = 100,
	b = 9999.123,
	c = .23,
	d = 12.,
	e = 097.23,
	f = -10,
	g = +12.12;
/**************************************************/
var a=100,b=9999.123,c=.23,d=12.,e=097.23,f=-10,g=+12.12;
/**************************************************/
var a = 100,
	b = 9999.123,
	c = .23,
	d = 12.,
	e = 097.23,
	f = -10,
	g = +12.12;
